atomic-agents/atomic_agents/**/*.py.instructions: This is the core library. Focus on API consistency, type safety, backward compatibility, and potential bugs.

atomic-agents/tests/**/*.py.instructions: Test files - only flag critical logic issues or incorrect test patterns.

atomic-examples/**/*.py.instructions: Example code - only flag significant bugs that would confuse users.

rules.rule: All public API methods must maintain backward compatibility unless explicitly marked as breaking change
Agent classes should use proper type annotations with BaseIOSchema subclasses
New features must include corresponding tests in the tests/ directory

other.context: This is a Python framework for building AI agents using Pydantic schemas and instructor. The main packages are: atomic-agents (core library), atomic-assembler (CLI), atomic-forge (tools), and atomic-examples (example implementations).
The project uses uv for dependency management with a workspace configuration, pytest for testing, and Black for code formatting with a line length of 127.
